name: icmpMsgStatsTable
description: The table of system-wide per-version, per-message type ICMP counters.

.1.3.6.1.2.1.5.30.1.1.name: icmpMsgStatsIPVersion
.1.3.6.1.2.1.5.30.1.1.description: The IP version of the statistics.

.1.3.6.1.2.1.5.30.1.2.name: icmpMsgStatsType
.1.3.6.1.2.1.5.30.1.2.description: The ICMP type field of the message type being counted by this row. Note that ICMP message types are scoped by the address type in use.

.1.3.6.1.2.1.5.30.1.3.name: icmpMsgStatsInPkts
.1.3.6.1.2.1.5.30.1.3.description: The number of input packets for this AF and type.

.1.3.6.1.2.1.5.30.1.4.name: icmpMsgStatsOutPkts
.1.3.6.1.2.1.5.30.1.4.description: The number of output packets for this AF and type.
